page.title: 18RECREATION - BURGHFIELD
page.content: Beavers: On Monday evening I go tp Beavers. You can go to Beavers before you start Cubs. We play games like crab-football. Crab-football is football but you stand on your hands and feet. We make things and sometimes go on trips to places like the zoo. Cubs: In Cubs, we do all sorts of things and we work for 'arrow badges' and proficiency badges. I enjoy Cubs a lot, I am a Seconder of the 'black' six. On Saturday we are going to camp. Scouts: Scouts is an activity for boys over ten years old. In Scouts you learn how to tie special knots, how to cook on open fires and to set up tents. There are a range of courses to take part in and badges to learn.
